revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #33 Watmel |image = [[File:Watmel.png]] |caption = A bounty of nature that is exceedingly sweet. The Berry is huge, with some discovered that exceed 20 inches. |growtime = 4h 36m 0s |harvest = 32 berries |replant = 10% |points = 1,000 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Watmel''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Magost]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sweet and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Magost]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 38 mins 20 secs || 56 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 43 mins 20 secs || 4 hours 36 mins - 9 hours 12 mins |- ! Animation |
